title: HCl equil mechanism - reason for large value of K

content.question: Which of the following statements identifies the greatest single reason that the value of Kp for the overall reaction at 298 K has such a large magnitude?

choices.label: The activation energy for step 1 of the mechanism is large and positive.
The activation energy for step 2 of the mechanism is small and positive.
The value of ΔS° for the overall reaction is small and positive.
The value of ΔH° for the overall reaction is large and negative.

content.answer: The value of ΔH° for the overall reaction is large and negative.

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
